svg.text: Clonotyping performance. To test the performance of enclone, we combined data from 443 BCR libraries from 30 donors,
which yielded 9573 clonotypes having at least two cells each, of which 15 (0.16%) contained data from multiple donors.
These multi-donor clonotypes are errors. The fact that there are few of them suggests that the rate at which enclone places
unrelated cells in the same clonotype is low. This is a consequence of both the paired chain data and the algorithm.
